meanings.definition: To bring about or introduce as an additional element or factor.
meanings.sent1: Adding sugar superinduces sweetness to the dessert.
meanings.sent2: The new ingredient superinduces a unique flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent3: His joke about adding a hat to a snowman superinduces laughter.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected rain superinduces a sense of coziness indoors.
meanings.sent5: Mixing colors superinduces a vibrant painting.

meanings.definition: To cause to arise or occur as a consequence.
meanings.sent1: Skipping breakfast superinduces hunger later in the day.
meanings.sent2: Lack of sleep superinduces tiredness in the afternoon.
meanings.sent3: Her constant singing superinduces annoyance among her friends.
meanings.sent5: Exercise superinduces a feeling of accomplishment.
